verses.name: Genesis 31:1
verses.text: And he heard the words of Laban’s sons, saying, Jacob hath taken away all that was our father’s; and of that which was our father’s hath he gotten all this glory.

verses.name: Genesis 31:2
verses.text: And Jacob beheld the countenance of Laban, and, behold, it was not toward him as before.

verses.name: Genesis 31:3
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Jacob, Return unto the land of thy fathers, and to thy kindred; and I will be with thee.

verses.name: Genesis 31:4
verses.text: And Jacob sent and called Rachel and Leah to the field unto his flock,
